entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:58 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023
